title: Design Thinking-Based Project Development Training

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Problem-Solving Skills and Team Project Experience
context.additional_context: Practical design thinking education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners apply and execute the five stages of design thinking (Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test) to real-world social issues.
Through team-based collaboration, learners derive user-centered innovative solutions and materialize them into project deliverables.
Learners compose a reflective report on the entire design thinking process using quantitative/qualitative assessment tools (surveys, observations, feedback).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
